translation.en: Abraham said, “I swear it.”

translation.en: of Zakkai 760
translation.sw: Abo mu ba Zakayi n’amajana ndwi na mirongwitandatu.

translation.en: Shaalabbin, Aijalon, Ithlah,
translation.sw: n’i Shalabina n’i Ayaloni n’i Itula,

translation.en: The punishment inflicted on him by the majority is sufficient.
translation.sw: Ico gihano abenshi bāmuhannye, kiramaze k’ūmeze artyo,

translation.en: His division numbers 46,500.
translation.sw: Ingabo zāharūwe zabo zar’ ibihumbi mirongwine na bitandatu n’amajana atanu.

translation.en: Rezin, Nekoda, Gazzam,
translation.sw: no mu ba Resini, no mu ba Nekoda, no mu ba Gazamu,

translation.en: Reaiah, Rezin, Nekoda,
translation.sw: no mu ba Reyaya, no mu ba Resini, no mu ba Nekoda,

translation.en: Hagab, Shalmai, Hanan,
translation.sw: no mu ba Hagabu, no mu ba Shamulayi, no mu ba Hanani,

translation.en: of Bigvai 2,056
translation.sw: Abo mu ba Bigivayi n’ibihumbi bibiri na mirongwitanu na batandatu.

translation.en: The day after Gedaliah’s assassination, before anyone knew about it,
translation.sw: Bukeye ku musi ugira kabiri amaze kwica Gedaliya, kand’ ata wurabimenya,

translation.en: of Netophah 56
translation.sw: Abagabo b’i Netofa ni mirongwitanu na batandatu.

translation.en: “Listen! A farmer went out to sow his seed.
translation.sw: ati Ni mwumve; umubivyi yasohoye imbuto.

translation.en: “Make upright frames of acacia wood for the tabernacle.
translation.sw: Kand’ uz’ ubāze imbaho mu giti c’umushita zo guhagarika iryo hema ry’imbere, uzishinge.

translation.en: Jesus answered: “Watch out that no one deceives you.
translation.sw: Yesu arabishura, ati Mwirinde, ntihagire ūbazimiza.

translation.en: Then the word of the Lord came to me:
translation.sw: Maz’ ijambo ry’Uhoraho rinzako,

translation.en: “Son of man, take up a lament concerning Tyre.
translation.sw: riti Nawe, mwana w’umuntu, cura intimba uririre Tiro;

translation.en: “Go, tell them to return to their tents.
translation.sw: Ati Genda ubabgire, uti Ni mwisubirire mu mahema yanyu.

translation.en: to deny people their rights before the Most High,
translation.sw: Canke kugoreka urubanza rw’ umuntu mu nyonga z’Īsumba vyose,

translation.en: His division numbers 53,400.
translation.sw: ingabo zāharūwe zabo zar’ ibihumbi mirongwitanu na bitatu n’amajana ane.

translation.en: These were the Horite chiefs: Lotan, Shobal, Zibeon, Anah,
translation.sw: Aba ni bo bakuru b’imiryango bākomōtse mu Bahori: Lotani na Shobali na Sibeyoni na Ana,
